title: I bought 5€ RP but didnt get it.
body: Hi I bought 5€ RP but didnt get it. I checked my phone and it says *-5€*. Relogged LOL and I still havent recieved my RP :(

replies.body: It can take a few moments or a relog to update your balance.  Is everything okay now?  You can double check your ban transaction to see if it's still processing or finalized.  Let me know!

That's strange!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can dig into this with you.  We'll be able to see if the transaction was able to get through to us.  Hang tight until then!

It is not fixed :(
FIXED I THINK
